mapper.select: select from TB4D_DATASET ORDER by DS_SQL_ORDER DESC
select case when max(DS_SQL_ORDER) is null then 1 else max(DS_SQL_ORDER)+1 end ORDERNUM from TB4D_DATASET
select * from TB4D_DATASET where DS_SQL_ORDER = (select max(DS_SQL_ORDER) from TB4D_DATASET where DS_SQL_ORDER<(select DS_SQL_ORDER from TB4D_DATASET where DS_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select * from TB4D_DATASET where DS_SQL_ORDER = (select min(DS_SQL_ORDER) from TB4D_DATASET where DS_SQL_ORDER>(select DS_SQL_ORDER from TB4D_DATASET where DS_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
